name: Squat New York
description:
Squat New York is an award-winning advertising and design agency that specializes in the craft of brand making. Our work covers a wide array of businesses in the following industries: creative marketing, technology, consumer products, real estate, publishing, food, fashion, agriculture and more.
We specialize in many areas such as branding, web design, editorial and package design, mobile application design, development of strategic marketing and advertising campaigns, as well as video production and animation.
